text: Hi <@U2H3TT8F2> i have confused why my theme Submitted at January 31, 2022 12:32 PM
Hey Makara, can you provide me with your portal ID and I can take a look. Rest assured, you are in the competition :slightly_smiling_face:
At that night i submit it not deadline yet and you allow me to update theme too
When i submit my time zone is at night so it have 12 hour more to deadline and i alway check count down in devpost too.
Am really afraid my theme is not in competition
Hey Makara, no worries, you are in the competition. Your theme was submitted at 12:32PM in the afternoon and your deadline was 11:45PM in the evening. Youâ€™re all good.
Ohhh thank you so much, i don't have update any thing in my theme list when i checked again see the time of submitted am so scare my not in the competition.

I submitted my theme on the 31st and it's in the marketplace queue, but if I wanted to make minor edits that I've spotted, can I do that and resubmit (I know it goes to the end of the queue) or will that affect the challenge? Would it be better to wait until they send any feedback or it's approved? Thanks!

<@UBUNBSM24> I think you should not update anything just wait for the reviewer to review your theme, if you resubmit your theme again it will count as a new date submit and your theme submit will not be in the competition. I have asked this question before too.
